summary: Completed frontend testing of Quick Trade from Scanner feature. All core functionality working correctly - Trade buttons appear in scanner results, Quick Trade modal opens with pre-filled data, template auto-selection works, SL/TP auto-calculation works, risk preview displays correctly, and trade submission creates trade in database.
passed_tests: Scanner page - Trade button appears for each result row (10 Trade buttons found)
Quick Trade modal opens when clicking Trade button
Quick Trade modal pre-fills symbol from scanner result (MSFT, AAPL verified)
Quick Trade modal pre-fills entry price from scanner result ($451.63, $250.29 verified)
Quick Trade modal shows context badge (Range, Trending, Reversion)
Quick Trade modal shows scanner score (72, 69 verified)
Quick Trade modal shows top strategy (INT-01 - Trend Momentum Continuation)
Quick Trade modal auto-selects matching template (Trend Momentum INT-01)
Template selector dropdown shows Strategy Templates section
Template selector dropdown shows Basic Templates section
Template selector shows context badges for each template (Trending, Reversion)
Quick Trade modal shows risk info (Risk: 1% | R:R: 2.5:1)
Quick Trade modal auto-calculates Stop Loss from template risk %
Quick Trade modal auto-calculates Take Profit from template R:R ratio
Risk preview shows Risk/Share (-$4.52, -$2.50 verified)
Risk preview shows Total Risk (-$452.00, -$250.00 verified)
Risk preview shows Potential Profit (+$1129.00, +$626.00 verified)
Notes field pre-filled with scanner setup info (Score, RVOL)
Trade submission works - POST /api/trades returns 200 OK
Trade created in database with correct values (MSFT verified in Trade Journal)
Trade Journal shows trade with all Quick Trade data (symbol, strategy, entry, SL, TP, notes)
seed_data_creation: MSFT trade created via Quick Trade modal during testing

mocked_apis_list: Insider Trading data - uses simulated data

context_for_next_testing_agent: Quick Trade from Scanner feature fully implemented and tested. Trade buttons in scanner results table open QuickTradeModal which pre-fills all trade details from scanner results. Template selector auto-selects matching template based on strategy/context and auto-calculates SL/TP based on template risk_percent and reward_ratio. Risk preview shows Risk/Share, Total Risk, and Potential Profit. Trade submission creates trade in database with all scanner context preserved in notes.

quick_trade_from_scanner.ui_location: Scanner page > Run Scanner > Click Trade button on any result row
modal_components: Scanner Info Banner (symbol, price, context badge, score, top strategy)
Template Selector dropdown (Strategy Templates, Basic Templates)
Trade Details form (Strategy, Direction, Entry Price, Shares)
Risk Preview (Risk/Share, Total Risk, Potential Profit)
Notes textarea (pre-filled with scanner setup info)
quick_trade_from_scanner.template_auto_selection: Matches template by strategy_id or market_context
